item.description: Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#1718; 10:15PM; 12323 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bsaJlj; North Hollywood; Amtrack train struck a pedestrian (circumstances unknown) and firefighters determined death of the patient on scene (age/gender unknown at this time). LAPD Inc# 4238 Sheriff Dept also responding. All further questions are referred to the appropriate law enforcement agency. Firefighters will assist with body recovery as required. The 9-1-1 call was received at 10:02PM. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E60 E81 EM17 HR3 RA81 RA86 RA889 RA89 T60 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1666; 09:40PM; 217 N Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3niq6zg; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire to the 1st floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E20 E203 E211 E220 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1666; 09:28PM; 217 N Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3niq6zg; Westlake; Two story, single family dwelling with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E20 E203 E211 E220 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1062; 07:32PM; 12001 Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xRPoJp; Hansen Dam; Firefighters have now fully contained both branches of the fire. No structures were damaged and no injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene throughout the night mopping up any hot spots and ensuring no flare ups occur. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Brush Fire - Hansen Dam #PaxtonIC 06/24/2022 INC#1062

item.description: Update Brush Fire - Hansen Dam #PaxtonIC; INC#1062; 05:31PM; 12001 Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xRPoJp; Hansen Dam; The fire is at approximately 10-12 acres with winds remaining about 8-10 mph. The Hansen Dam Aquatic Center was evacuated (approx 1,000 people). The remain no injuries reported and no other evacuations. Firefighters are making progress getting handlines around the perimeter of the fire but a containment % is not yet available. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO2 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC5 BP109 BP74 BP8 CE83 CM42 E220 E24 E274 E275 E29 E290 E39 E7 E73 E75 E81 E8136 E8138 E82C E88 E90 E91 EA1 EM14 H3 H4 H5 H6 HA3 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA12 RA77 RA78 RA90 RA91 RI600 T20 T74 T75 T90 WT77 WT88; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Hansen Dam #PaxtonIC; INC#1062; 03:17PM; 12001 Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xRPoJp; Hansen Dam; Approximately 1/2 acre burning in medium to heavy brush under 8-9 mph wind conditions. The fire is burning within the Hansen Dam area and no structures are threatened at this time. Two hand crews are being requested from LA County Fire. No injuries reported. #PaxtonIC; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO2 BC12 BC14 BC5 BP74 E220 E24 E274 E275 E7 E73 E75 E81 E91 EM14 H0E H4 HA4 RA77 T20 T74 T75 WT77; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0968; 03:21PM; 7610 N Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u2WHNv; Eagle Rock; This incident has been determined to be wholly within the City of Glendale jurisdiction. Some LAFD resources will remain on scene to assist while incident command is transitioned to Glendale Fire. All questions regarding the incident are referred to Glendale Fire. No further details. No further updates are anticipated.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM22 E10 E13 E15 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E212 E290 E4 E42 E447 E55 E6 E90 EM1 H5 HA5 RA2 RA88 RA90 RI600 T1 T12 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0968; 02:24PM; 7610 N Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u2WHNv; Eagle Rock; The fire is at approximately 2-3 acres in medium to heavy brush. There is now a light wind. There are still no evacuations in place and no structures threatened at this time. No injuries reported.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM22 E10 E13 E15 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E212 E290 E4 E42 E447 E55 E6 E90 EM1 H5 HA5 RA2 RA88 RA90 RI600 T1 T12 T90 WT88; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0968; 02:24PM; 7610 N Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u2WHNv; Eagle Rock; Firefighters are on scene with approximately 1/2 acre of light to medium brush, burning uphill with no wind. There are no evacuations and no structures threatened at this time. The incident was originally reported at 2:24 PM as an auto fire and was upgraded upon arrival of the first fire company. No further details.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E212 E290 E4 E42 E447 E90 EM1 H5 HA5 RA2 T1 T12 T90; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update FATALITY Trench Rescue; INC#0742; 12:18PM; 8405 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OX4NiP; Sun Valley; Sadly, the patient was determined dead on scene. The incident is transitioning to a recovery operation with some LAFD resources being released. This does not *appear* to be a city employee but instead a private business construction operation however that is not yet confirmed. OSHA is being notified, per protocol, and is the point of contact regarding circumstances/cause etc. LAPD (Inc# 2136) and LA County Coroner are the referring agencies regarding identity and cause of death. No further details. Note: The incident was initially reported as a Confined Space rescue and was updated to Trench Rescue once LAFD arrived and assessed the incident.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E227 E24 E288 E289 E298 E77 E88 E93 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA89 RA98 T27 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
